resources.string: Kia Carnival Variants and Price: Kia offers the MPV in three variants: Premium, Prestige, and Limousine. Each gets its own seating options. The Carnival is priced in the range of Rs 24.95 lakh to Rs 33.95 lakh (ex-showroom pan-India). Kia Carnival Engine: It comes with a BS6-compliant 2.2-litre diesel engine that puts out 200PS of power and 440Nm of torque and comes mated to an 8-speed automatic gearbox.
